One problem with the word "decentralized" is that it doesn't tell where data and coordination occurs. It just tells that it's not in one place. I prefer instead:

 "Local-first": SSB, Git
 "Federation": Mastodon
 "P2P Swarm": Bitcoin, DHTs

952215331640000512.text:
Batching in three sentences:
• Payments are not equal to transactions.
• A single transaction can facilitate multiple payments.
• Making multiple payments in one transaction requires fewer inputs, creates fewer change outputs and puts less funds in unconfirmed state.
